verse: Because God loved the world so much, that he gave his only begotten son, so that everyone who believes in him does not miss, but has eternal life.
The Lord is my pastor, nothing will be missing.
I can everything in Christ that strengthens me.
Be strong and brave.Do not be afraid or cowardly, because the Lord your God will be with you wherever you go.
Love is patient, it is kind.Love is not envious or jactious or proud.
Trust the Lord with all my heart, and not in your own intelligence.
Crows me, and I will answer you, and I will make you known great and hidden things that you do not know.
To anyone, then, to confess in front of men, I will also confess in front of my father who is in heaven.
And you will know the truth, and the truth will make you free.
And we know that those who love God, all things help them well, that is, to those who according to their purpose are called.
So if anyone is in Christ, new creature is;Old things happened;Here are all new ones.
For nothing you are eager;Rather, in everything, through prayer and replica with thanksgiving, your requests are known before God.
But first seek the kingdom of God and his justice, and all these things will be added to you.
Throwing all your anxiety about him, because he is careful of you.
It is, therefore, faith the certainty of what is expected, the conviction of what is not seen.
My brothers, have great joy when you find yourself in various tests, knowing that the proof of your faith produces patience.
Because God has not given us spirit of cowardice, but of power, love and self -dominance.
If you confess with your mouth that Jesus is the Lord, and you believe in your heart that God lifted him from the dead, you will be saved.
Here, I am at the door and I call;If anyone hears my voice and open the door, I will enter him and have dinner with him, and he with me.
What, then, will we say to this?If God is for us, who against us?
For the rest, my brothers, strengthened in the Lord and in the power of his strength.
Velad, be firm in faith;Portaos manly;thirst brave;Be strong.
Do not fear, because I am with you;Do not pass out, because I am your God;I will strengthen you and help you;I will support you with my right right hand.
But those who wait for Jehovah will have new strength;They will raise wings like the Eagles;They will run, and they will not get tired;They will walk, and they will not fatigue.
I all strive those who expect in Jehovah, and take breath your heart.
Jehovah is my light and my salvation;Who will I fear?Jehovah is the strength of my life;Who should I frighten me?
Therefore, we also, having our great cloud of witnesses around, we dispossess all weight and sin that besieged, and we run with patience the race we have ahead.
